page.title: 04M.25 MOTORWAY
page.content: One of the chief features in our area is the M.25 construction being undertaken by Balfour Beatty Construction Ltd. They are working on contract 4 which is due for completion in the Autumn of 1986. It covers a 5.4.km section of the M.25. Most of the work is done in the months when the weather is dryer but even in winter, earth moving plants are at work excavating sites & changing the landscape. Contract 4 follows the old A.6. and by-passes Potters Bar. It is a difficult section to build because of the large amount of traffic it carries daily. This has meant seventeen traffic diversions and the building of temporary roads and bridges.It's most impressive feature is the access point at bignell's corner where the motorway crosses over the A.1.
